name: Reindeer Christmas Cards
description:
Reindeer Christmas Cards

Last year I had a lot of requests to make this reindeer picture available as a Christmas card - so here it is! This shot is one of those moments when you’re in the right place at the right time – I was up on a bridge in Lapland when the beautiful animal walked right underneath me in the morning sunlight – and I just managed to take the shot and capture this slightly surreal Christmas picture.

The cards are 75p each and come in pack of ten for £7.50.

For each card sold 25p goes to Wood Street Mission, a charity for vulnerable children and families based in Manchester and Salford. 


Postage & Packaging -

United Kingdom £3.25 adding an extra £1 for each additional pack.
Europe & the rest of the world £4.50 adding an extra £2 for each additional pack. Disregard the my usual postal costs which are shown in the shopping cart.

description:
Angelic View

At the top of Manchester Town Hall four angels look down upon the city. Not included as part of Alfred Waterhouse’s original design, the angels were added after the clock tower, detailed on the original plans, was criticised by the judging panel who were to decide upon the new home for the city’s bureaucrats.
